participant_1.background:
I am afraid of not being able to control my diabetes.
I value my freedom and my time to do what I want.
I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner.
my grandma raised me.
i spend as much time as i can with my family.

participant_2.background:
I hope my family would be accepting, but I don't know for sure.
My parents are both hard-working people who have always supported my dreams.
I'm glad my wife is feeling better and we can enjoy the outdoors together.
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.
i listen to techno music , exclusively.

content.text: Hi, I'm Dan. I'm from New Jersey.
Hi Dan, I'm David from California.
Nice to meet you David.  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family, listen to techno music, and play video games. What about you?
I enjoy cooking and spending time with my family and friends.  I also like to travel.
I love to travel too!  I've been to Japan, China, and Mexico.  Where have you been?
I've been to Canada, France, and Germany.  I'd love to go to Japan someday.
Japan is amazing!  You should definitely go.  What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is classic rock.  What about you?
I like techno music and rap music.  I also like to listen to country music sometimes.
I've never been a big fan of rap music, but I do like country music.  I love to go camping and fishing.
I love camping too!  I've never been fishing, but I'd like to try it sometime.  Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Max.  He's a golden retriever.  Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets.  I'd love to have a dog, but I don't have the time to take care of one right now.
That's too bad.  Dogs are great companions.  Well, it was nice talking to you David.  I hope you have a great day.
You too Dan.  It was nice talking to you too.
